title: Leave 'em laughing; The Eccentrics
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Great Britain - History
description: Episode number 2 of Series "The Best of British". Leave 'em laughing features scenes from some of the finest British comedies and some of its greatest comedians; Sid Field, Jerry Desmond, Norman Wisdom, Will Hay and the Carry On Gang. "Eccentrics" is filled with some of the most endearing characters to appear on film; Dame Edith Evans, Sir Michael Redgrave, Cecil Parker, Alistair Sim, Peter Sellers and the gentle, amusing and complusive to watch, Margaret Rutherford. This volume captures the essence of British comedy at its best. Narrated by Sir John Mills.
related_objects: Series; S01125; The Best of British; Active; 1987
